author: wn.com
title: Kinsevere congratulates students at new Kasenga Technical University (MMG Ltd)
text: ( Source : MMG Ltd) MMG Kinsevere has congratulated students following their commencement at the Kasenga Technical University (UKAM), a new tertiary education facility in the Democratic Republic of Congo ( DRC ), last week. The university,
